/* Biography */
/* Legacy */ double wiki article linked in same paragraph. Removed one .
/* Legacy */ 'often cited'... as compared to 'known as'
/* Legacy */ Move bicentennial down
/* Legacy */ replaced Rothbard with Schumpeter, per talk
/* Legacy */ flow
/* Legacy */ expand sentence
/* Legacy */ mainstream and theory
/* Legacy */ extend sentence
/* Legacy */ removed frames.
/* Influence */ clarity
/* Legacy */ rewrite paragraph to include more info as to antecedents of marx and capitalism... free markets.
/* Legacy */ rm weasel worded statement. I'm also on the verge of removing the labor theory of value bit, because I know where that is going and I don't like it.
/* Legacy */ Labor theory of value most important when describing Smith
/* Legacy */ format
/* Legacy */ wiki art. link
/* Legacy */ mainstream wiki link
/* Legacy */ wiki art link
/* Legacy */ removed contrived quote of micro soft founder. Seems like Bill Gates P.O.V. Smith's labor theory may have founded communism also
Move value theory summary to section on Wealth of Nations
